content.raw:
In my gz_build_test run last night, I saw quite a few RaySensor_TEST failures. Some debugging this morning indicated that failure was more likely when running without a display, and that the failure may be caused by [clearing the Sensor plugins in Sensor::Fini](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/fdeb5c8f1d208ddf57b892c53128b5d305889dff/gazebo/sensors/Sensor.cc#cl-147). I have a release mode backtrace, which doesn't give line numbers, but it can be deduced that Sensor::Fini is a precursor to the error.
~~~
$ DISPLAY=asdf gazebo/sensors/RaySensor_TEST 
[==========] Running 1 test from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 1 test from RaySensor_TEST
[ RUN      ] RaySensor_TEST.CreateLaser
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 1.8.0
Copyright (C) 2013 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.67
Error [RenderEngine.cc:607] Can't open display: asdf
Warning [RenderEngine.cc:86] Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.02 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
Warning [parser.cc:413] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [Converter.cc:58]   Version[1.3] to Version[1.4]
  Please use the gzsdf tool to update your SDF files.
    $ gzsdf convert [sdf_file]
Dbg Create Ray Sensor
Dbg Update SensorManager
Dbg Found sensor named laser
*** glibc detected *** gazebo/sensors/RaySensor_TEST: corrupted double-linked list: 0x00000000019caae0 ***

content.html:
In my gz_build_test run last night, I saw quite a few RaySensor_TEST failures. Some debugging this morning indicated that failure was more likely when running without a display, and that the failure may be caused by clearing the Sensor plugins in Sensor::Fini. I have a release mode backtrace, which doesn't give line numbers, but it can be deduced that Sensor::Fini is a precursor to the error.

$ DISPLAY=asdf gazebo/sensors/RaySensor_TEST 
[==========] Running 1 test from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 1 test from RaySensor_TEST
[ RUN      ] RaySensor_TEST.CreateLaser
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 1.8.0
Copyright (C) 2013 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.67
Error [RenderEngine.cc:607] Can't open display: asdf
Warning [RenderEngine.cc:86] Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.02 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
Warning [parser.cc:413] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
Warning [Converter.cc:58]   Version[1.3] to Version[1.4]
  Please use the gzsdf tool to update your SDF files.
    $ gzsdf convert [sdf_file]
Dbg Create Ray Sensor
Dbg Update SensorManager
Dbg Found sensor named laser
